scripts.dev: cross-env ELECTRON_DEV=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_DEBUG_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_STACK_DUMPING=true NODE_ENV=development yarn build && yarn build:preload && yarn build:renderer && electron . --enable-logging --inspect=5858
scripts.build: cross-env ELECTRON_DEV=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_DEBUG_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_STACK_DUMPING=true NODE_ENV=development vite build --config vite.main.config.ts
scripts.build:preload: cross-env ELECTRON_DEV=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_DEBUG_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_STACK_DUMPING=true NODE_ENV=development vite build --config vite.preload.config.ts
scripts.build:renderer: cross-env ELECTRON_DEV=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_DEBUG_LOGGING=true ELECTRON_ENABLE_STACK_DUMPING=true NODE_ENV=development vite build --config vite.renderer.config.ts
